Add.Name: GetNewsItemXml
Add.SerializedFunction: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.News.NewsItem.GetNewsItemXml"><f:param name="PropertyNames"><f:paramelement value="PageId.MenuTitle" /><f:paramelement value="PageId.Id" /><f:paramelement value="Date" /><f:paramelement value="Teaser" /><f:paramelement value="Id" /><f:paramelement value="Title" /><f:paramelement value="TitleUrl" /></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Filter"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.News.NewsItem.ActivePageReferenceFilter"><f:param name="SitemapScope" value="Level1AndDescendants" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="OrderByField" value="Date" /><f:param name="OrderAscending" value="False" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="PageSize"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.GetInputParameter"><f:param name="InputParameterName" value="Count" /></f:function></f:param></f:function>

Add.Name: GetNewsItemXml
Add.SerializedFunction: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.News.NewsItem.GetNewsItemXml"><f:param name="PropertyNames"><f:paramelement value="Description" /><f:paramelement value="Date" /><f:paramelement value="Teaser" /><f:paramelement value="Id" /><f:paramelement value="Title" /><f:paramelement value="TitleUrl" /></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Filter"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.News.GetNewsFilterFromUrl" /></f:param><f:param name="OrderByField" value="Date" /><f:param name="OrderAscending" value="False" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="PageSize"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.GetInputParameter"><f:param name="InputParameterName" value="PageSize" /></f:function></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="PageNumber"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.News.GetPageNumber" /></f:param><f:param name="IncludePagingInfo" value="True" /></f:function>
